text.config.mobrebirth.title: Mob Rebirth Config
text.config.mobrebirth.general.desc: Can be overridden by individual mobs.
text.config.mobrebirth.option.vanillaMob: Only allow vanilla mobs be reborn?
text.config.mobrebirth.defaultSettings.d: Default settings to be applied to mobs allowed in General Settings.
text.config.mobrebirth.option.multiMobMo: 'Continuous' applies the chance to each extra mob, and stops when one doesn't spawn.
'Per-Mob' applies the chance to each extra mob.
text.config.mobrebirth.option.multiMobCo: How many extra mobs to spawn. This does not include the initial reborn mob.
text.config.mobrebirth.option.rebornAsEg: Should the mob drop a spawn egg instead of being fully reborn?
text.config.mobrebirth.option.rebirthFro: Should the mob be reborn when killed by a player?
Should the mob be reborn when killed by a non-player?
text.config.mobrebirth.option.preventSun: Prevent sunlight damage to the undead. Protects against the sunlight apocalypse in some scenarios.
Biome list for rebirth. If it contains "*" it is a blocklist, otherwise it is an allowlist.
text.config.mobrebirth.option.rebornMobW: Weighted list of mob ids that can spawn from this one. An empty id means the current mob's id will be used.
text.config.mobrebirth.customSettings.de: Custom settings to be applied to specific mobs.
